templates.title: Portrait
templates.body: Create a polished portrait of the subject in the provided reference images. Preserve their facial structure, hairstyle, and key accessories while presenting a confident three-quarter pose from the waist up. Style the outfit as refined casual wear, use soft cinematic lighting with gentle rim light, and finish with a subtle warm gradient background for a studio-quality look.

templates.title: Reference Sheet
templates.body:
Use the provided reference image(s) as guidance for a clean character reference sheet.
Include the following views with consistent proportions and style:
1. Face close-up, neutral expression
2. Face close-up, smiling expression
3. Full body front view
4. Full body side view (profile)
5. Full body back view

Ensure each pose is clearly separated and aligned on the same white canvas.

templates.title: Product Shot
templates.body: Render a premium hero shot of the referenced product for marketing use. Highlight its signature features, materials, and finish with crisp studio lighting and soft shadows. Place the item on a reflective surface against a tasteful gradient backdrop, add a faint glow behind the product, and compose the frame for magazine-quality presentation.

templates.title: Environment
templates.body: Paint a cinematic wide-shot environment inspired by the reference imagery. Showcase the terrain, architectural elements, and atmospheric conditions with a cohesive color palette and dramatic directional light. Include depth cues, foreground framing elements, and subtle environmental storytelling to make the scene feel alive and ready for concept art handoff.

templates.title: Figure Concept
templates.body: Design a collectible figure concept based on the provided references. Present front, three-quarter, and rear angles on a shared neutral platform, keeping proportions identical across views. Emphasize sculpted details, layered costuming, and premium paint finishes, illuminated by crisp studio lighting with soft rim highlights.
